attributes.action: all foreign aid to be immediatly halted
attributes.additional_details: foreign aid is a drain upon british resources. it takes around £8 billion per year and so far there is little visible results. with the eurozone in a poor state and the world falling to pieces we have to use the money to save ourselves. our aid goes to two extremes. some aid goes to the new-money powerhouses of china and india,while other parts go to pakistan and somalia. the first two countries dont need anymore money and the laater two states are not in our immediate attention. so please sign this petition to save britains economy,public services and money in the cabinet
